item.title: Jan Holoubek’s WWII Thriller ‘Wild, Wild East,’ Starring Itay Tiran and Joanna Kulig, Boarded by Global Constellation (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Global Constellation has boarded worldwide sales rights to Jan Holoubek’s World War II noir thriller “Wild, Wild East,” hot off its inclusion in the Gap Financing Market at the Venice Film Festival. G
